thread.section_title: Hotel La Lanterne - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (Paris, France) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: A Jewel In the Heart of Paris
thread.title_full: A Jewel In the Heart of Paris - Review of Hotel La Lanterne, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: MGL324
title: A Jewel In the Heart of Paris
text:
La Lanterne is a chic and classy jewel just minutes from Notre Dame and Ile Saint Louie. Located right off of Boulevard St. Germain, you can walk to the most important sites in the area The rooms are wonderfully appointed and in great condition. The pictures accurately depict the ambiance and the experience. It doesn't get much better than this in the heart of Paris.
Room Tip: Smokers should choose Room 2 as it has a ground floor patio. See more room tips
